configFile.description: Path to the JSON configuration file. If provided, all listed options will be read from this file instead.

from.description: Represents the starting timestamp from which to query the logs. Defaults to (now OR "to" field) - 1 hour.

to.description: Represents the ending timestamp until which the logs will be queried. Defaults to now.

clearOutputDir.description: If true, clears the specified output directory without prompting.

outputFolder.description: Path to a folder that will contain subfolders for separate query downloads.

outputName.description: Name of the folder that will contain the downloaded files.

query.description: A Loki query written in standard format.

lokiUrl.description: Base URL of Loki API instance.

coolDown.description: Time to wait between fetching the next batch of records from the Loki API.

totalRecordsLimit.description: Limit on the total number of records to download.

fileRecordsLimit.description: Limit on the number of records outputted to each file.

batchRecordsLimit.description: Limit on the number of records fetched from the Loki API in a single request.

promptToStart.description: Ask for confirmation before the download starts.

orgId.description: Adds X-Scope-OrgID header to API requests for representing tenant ID.

headers.description: Additional request headers that will be present in every Loki API request. Can be used to provide authorization header.

queryTags.description: Adds X-Query-Tags header to API requests for tracking the query.

prettyLogs.description: Add make output fancier when printing progress logs.
